main.name: Arcot Gautham
main.description: I am an enthusatic learner and skillful developer with an eye of photographer
main.bio: I have started learning from textbooks so you cant see most of the ceritifcates im a bookworm so, i have proficency in Java, Python, Bash Scripting and i will be keep learning of technologies from the offical websites like python.org, oracle.com, it will be dry once you get a hang of it you will love it, i have done machine learning, Deep learning and Algorithms from Standford, i have worked on devops as well, i have made a proper devops strategy for a company and i have created my trojans and virus, apart from my base languages i do have profiecny in React js, Git, Docker, Kubernets, AWS, GCP, Heroku, as you can see my github, i have done few project in Machine Learning and Deep Learning in my github and apart from tech side, i do have a creative side i.e., im a photographer you can find me on unsplash @arcot, in case you are wondering what is arcot its my firstname
main.contactmessage: Hi i'm Arcot feel free to see my linked-in, Github, Unsplash any queries you can drop a mail or text me thank you!.

education.description: I am mechanical engineer, with passion of computer science i was always into coding and stuff i was in E-cell in my university, i was in a startup when i was studying and i was also working in startup, like that i was a mentor in NASA space apps Challenge when i was in 4th year itself, i was also assisting my professors in their projects.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: I am a Java Developer, I was assigned to develop Restend points API's for QuickFilter's in the company website which filter out the products which ever user selects, was assigned to Product page for the company website using Solr, i was also working on few live issues, i was a debugger and also assigned to devops for AWS.

work.title: Co-Founder & Tech Blogger
work.description: I will be taking care of backend code and server maintance and posting blogs.

work.title: IoT Developer Intern
work.description: I was assigned to work on a Home Automation using Raspberry pi and Google Assistance.

work.title: Web Developer Intern
work.description: I was assigned to create muliple websites for the company clients, and also i was interacting with clients for project discussions and negotations, i was also assisting as a logo Designer and a photographer.

work.title: Android Developer Intern
work.description: I was Assigned to create an android application using java for an E-commerce Company called prideHunt.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
